creditline: Gift of Stanley and Lucile Slocum
inscription:
Inscription; Mark

in pencil, upper center verso: [The Palm(Es?)/from/Marmion]; in pencil, lower center verso (late 19th c. or early 20th c. hand): [7]
markings: crown surmounting shield (lower section cut off at right edge), on watermark (same as .15 and .22 which completes it)
portfolio: From Scott's Marmion, one of forty pencil drawings from a sketchbook.
title: The Palmer (Figure Appearing Before Drinking Men)
